scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.github: git add . && git commit -m "commit message here" && git push -u origin master && git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m "commit message here" && git checkout --orphan latest_branch && git add -A && git commit -am "commit message here" && git branch -D master && git branch -m master && git push -f origin master
